messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] homeopathy; was patterns
messages.msgSnippet: thanks. I had done a google search and saw how much there was, so thanks for sharing a few favorites. any warnings about what to stay away from? susan ...
messages.messageBody:
thanks. I had done a google search and saw how much there was, so thanks
for sharing a few favorites.

any warnings about what to stay away from?
susan

On Monday, November 18, 2002, at 12:32 PM, Yol, Vishnu & Shanti wrote:

> I find this discussion fascinating. I would love to learn more about
> homeopathy. Where do I start?
>
> thanks much,
> susan in maryland
>
> Well, there are so many sources on the internet to start learning about
> homeopathy... You could just do a search on *homeopathy* and
> probably find tons about it. Some I know of are:
>
> http://www.likecureslike.org/
> http://www.homeopathic.org/
> http://www.bluelotustherapeutics.com
> http://www.homeopathic.com/index.php
>
> Sorry I can't add the links for you to click directly. For some reason
> when I add html my messages bounce back. Hope this helps!
>
> Yol
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] homeopathy; was patterns
messages.msgSnippet: I find this discussion fascinating. I would love to learn more about homeopathy. Where do I start? thanks much, susan in maryland Well, there are so many
messages.messageBody:
I find this discussion fascinating. I would love to learn more about
homeopathy. Where do I start?

thanks much,
susan in maryland

Well, there are so many sources on the internet to start learning about homeopathy... You could just do a search on *homeopathy* and
probably find tons about it. Some I know of are:

http://www.likecureslike.org/
http://www.homeopathic.org/
http://www.bluelotustherapeutics.com
http://www.homeopathic.com/index.php

Sorry I can't add the links for you to click directly. For some reason when I add html my messages bounce back. Hope this helps!

Yol
